document.heading: Prescription Drug Dispensing Practices Reform Act of 2009

history.narrative: Law 18-118, the “Prescription Drug Dispensing Practices Reform Act of 2009”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-240, which was referred to the Committee on Health. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 3, 2009, and December 1, 2009, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 11, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-266 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-118 became effective on March 11, 2010.
